description: Up the indulgence factor with these buttermilk pancakes topped with a fudgy Nutella sauce. A store-bought pancake mix makes this recipe a breeze to make.
keywords: Sweet pancake,Banana,Seafood free,Pancakes, waffles & French toast,Pancake,Sesame free
name: Buttermilk Pancakes With Banana & Fudgy Nutella Sauce Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place chocolate, Nutella and cream in a microwave-safe bowl. Microwave on high for 1 minute, stirring halfway through with a metal spoon, or until melted and smooth. Set aside.
Add 1 1/3 cups water to pancake mix bottle. Secure lid and shake for 1 minute or until well combined

Brush a little melted butter in a large frying pan over medium heat. Pour enough batter into pan to form a 12cm round. Cook for 2 minutes or until bubbles appear on the surface. Flip over and cook for 1 minute or until golden and cooked through. Transfer to a plate and cover to keep warm. Repeat with remaining butter and batter to make 8 pancakes in total.
Stack pancakes on a serving plate. Top with one-quarter of banana and drizzle with a little sauce. Serve with remaining banana and sauce.
